text: Jonathan Louis Oppenheim (November 10, 1952 â€“ July 16, 2020) was an American movie and television editor and producer. His works were mainly documentaries. Oppenheim was known for his work on The Oath (2010) and Paris Is Burning (1990). He was born in New York City. Oppenheim died on July 16, 2020 from brain cancer, aged 67.Jonathan Oppenheim, 'Paris Is Burning' Editor, Dies at 67 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:American movie editors Category:American television producers Category:Movie producers from New York City
